name: Doggy Tutus
description:
From Chihuahuas to Bull Mastiffs, your furry princess needs to look good too! 
Sizes Range from XXS to XXXL and I can make customs for those that don't fit the size ranges.

How To Measure:

Have the dog stand on all four legs as normal. Using a soft measuring tape, measure around the belly just in front of the hind legs. Pull the tape measure snug but not too tight. Tutus are made with an elastic waistband for comfort. There is a gap under the belly to prevent soiling. 

Sizing Guide
We highly recommend measuring your pet using the sizing guide below. Go up one size if they are in between sizes or if they have a lot of hair.
 
               Waist          Tutu Length
XXS         6-9"              4"
XS         9.5-12"           4"
S          12.5-15"         4"
M         15.5-18"         4"
L          18.5-21"         5"
XL       21.5-24"          6"
XXL    24.5-28"           7"
XXXL  29.5-32"          8"

name: Tutu Dress
description:
Custom Hand made Tutu Dress. Any color.

For Traditional TUTU Dresses:
Measure under the arm pits around the entire chest.  Then measure for length from under the arm down to the length you would like the dress to fall (i.e..the knees, shins or ankles)

Newborn to 6 months:

Chest up to 15 inches and up to 16 inches of length

6 -12 months:

Chest up to 16 inches and up to 17 inches of length

12months - 18 months:

Chest up to 18 inches and up to 18 inches of length

2T: Chest up to 19 inches up to 22 inches of length

3T: Chest up to 19 inches up to 24 inches of length

4T: Chest up to 21 inches up to 28 inches of length

5T: Chest up to 23 inches up to 32 inches of length

6/7: Chest up to 24 inches up to 36 inches of length

name: Tutu
description:
This is for a custom made tutu.  It won't be exactly like the one in the picture. I can use any colors you'd like as well. Prices are by size, not by color. 

For Tutus:
Measure around the waistline to determine which of the following sizes are most appropriate for your little one.  For best fit, it is recommended that you order your tutu one inch smaller than the actual waist measurement.

Each  Tutu is custom made to order based on the specifications you provide.  In each of our tutus, waist bands are made with 1" non-roll elastic, and will stretch an addtional 2-3" to allow for growth. I can also make them with Ribbon waists, if you would like a ribbon waist please let me know, and use your childs exact waist measurement for best fit with no gaps.
 
If you are ordering for someone who you dont know their measurements, you can use these average sizes. Please remember that the sizes are made an average size and mat not be exactly right.

For Tutus:
Measure around the waist and then  from waist to length you would like the the tutu to be.
 

Newborn to 6 months:

waist 14 inches length 6/7 inches

6 -12 months:

waist 16 inches length 7/8 inches

12months - 2T:

waist 18 inches length 8 inches (perfect with our bloomers)

12 months - 2T:

waist 18 inches length 10 inches (perfect portrait length)

2T/3T:

waist 19 inches length 10 inches

4T/5T:

waist 20 inches length 10/11 inches

5/6:

waist 21 inches length 11/12 inches
